      • meet

        public java.util.Set<Register> meet(Node n)
        Description copied from class: DataFlowAnalysis
        The meet operator of the Gen/Kill framework. Given a node, combines all the IN/OUT of it's successors/predecessors, depending on the type of analysis implemented. Handles the OUT[B] = meet(IN[B]) or IN[B] = meet(OUT[B]) internally for each node
        Specified by:
        meet in class DataFlowAnalysis<java.util.Set<Register>>
